member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.BatteryStatus
member.summary: Defines values that represent the status of the battery on the device.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.BatteryStatus.Charging
member.summary: The battery is charging.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.BatteryStatus.Discharging
member.summary: The battery is discharging.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.BatteryStatus.Idle
member.summary: The battery is idle.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.BatteryStatus.NotPresent
member.summary: The battery is not present.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.DisplayStatus
member.summary: Defines values that represent the status of the display that is associated with the app's session.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.DisplayStatus.Dimmed
member.summary: The display is dimmed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.DisplayStatus.Off
member.summary: The display is off.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.DisplayStatus.On
member.summary: The display is on.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.EffectivePowerMode
member.summary: Defines values that represent the effective power mode of the device.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.EffectivePowerMode.Balanced
member.summary: The device is in the balanced effective power mode.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.EffectivePowerMode.BatterySaver
member.summary: The device is in battery saver mode.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.EffectivePowerMode.BetterBattery
member.summary: The device is in the better battery effective power mode.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.EffectivePowerMode.GameMode
member.summary: The device is in game mode power mode.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.EffectivePowerMode.HighPerformance
member.summary: The device is in the high performance effective power mode.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.EffectivePowerMode.MaxPerformance
member.summary: The device is in the maximum performance effective power mode.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.EffectivePowerMode.MixedReality
member.summary: The device is in the windows mixed reality power mode.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.EnergySaverStatus
member.summary: Defines values that represent the battery saver states of the device.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.EnergySaverStatus.Disabled
member.summary: Battery saver is disabled.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.EnergySaverStatus.Off
member.summary: Battery saver is off.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.EnergySaverStatus.On
member.summary: Battery saver is on.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.EnergySaverStatus.Uninitialized
member.summary: Battery saver is uninitialized.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager
member.summary: Provides static events that notify your app of changes to the devices power state and static properties that provide access to current power state information.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.BatteryStatusChanged
member.summary: Raised when the status of the battery on the device has changed.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.DisplayStatusChanged
member.summary: Raised when the status of the display that is associated with the app's session.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.EffectivePowerModeChanged
member.summary: Raised when the effective power mode of the device has changed.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.EnergySaverStatusChanged
member.summary: Raised when battery saver has been turned off or on in response to changing power conditions.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.PowerSourceKindChanged
member.summary: Raised when the power source of the device has changed.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.PowerSupplyStatusChanged
member.summary: Raised when the power supply status of the device has changed.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.RemainingChargePercentChanged
member.summary: Raised when the remaining charge percentage of the battery on the device has changed.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.RemainingDischargeTimeChanged
member.summary: Raised when the remaining discharge time of the battery on the device has changed.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.SystemIdleStatusChanged
member.summary: Raised when the system is busy. This indicates that the system will not be moving into an idle state in the near future and that the current time is a good time for components to perform background or idle tasks that would otherwise prevent the computer from entering an idle state.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.SystemSuspendStatusChanged
member.summary: Raised when the suspend status of the device has changed.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.UserPresenceStatusChanged
member.summary: Raised when the user status associated with the app's session has changed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.BatteryStatus
member.summary: Gets the current status of the battery on the device.
member.returns: The current status of the battery.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.DisplayStatus
member.summary: Gets the current status of the display that is associated with the app's session.
member.returns: The current status of the display that is associated with the app's session.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.EffectivePowerMode
member.summary: Gets the current effective power mode of the device.
member.returns: The current effective power mode of the device.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.EnergySaverStatus
member.summary: Gets the current state of battery saver on the device.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.PowerSourceKind
member.summary: Gets the current power source of the device.
member.returns: The current power source of the device.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.PowerSupplyStatus
member.summary: Gets the current power supply status of the device.
member.returns: The current power supply status of the device.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.RemainingChargePercent
member.summary: Gets the remaining charge percentage of the battery on the device.
member.returns: The remaining charge percentage of the battery.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.RemainingDischargeTime
member.summary: Gets the remaining discharge time of the battery on the device.
member.returns: The remaining discharge time of the battery.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.SystemSuspendStatus
member.summary: Gets the current suspend status of the device.
member.returns: The current suspend status of the device.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerManager.UserPresenceStatus
member.summary: Gets the current user status associated with the app's session.
member.returns: The current user present status of the device.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerSourceKind
member.summary: Defines values that represent the power source of the device.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerSourceKind.AC
member.summary: The computer is powered by an AC power source (or similar, such as a laptop powered by a 12V automotive adapter).

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerSourceKind.DC
member.summary: The computer is powered by an onboard battery power source.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerSupplyStatus
member.summary: Defines values that represent the power supply status of the device.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerSupplyStatus.Adequate
member.summary: Power supply is adequate.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerSupplyStatus.Inadequate
member.summary: Power supply is not adequate.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.PowerSupplyStatus.NotPresent
member.summary: Power supply is not present.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.SystemSuspendStatus
member.summary: Defines values that represent the suspend status of the device.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.SystemSuspendStatus.AutoResume
member.summary: The device is automatically resuming from suspend state.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.SystemSuspendStatus.Entering
member.summary: The device is entering suspend state.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.SystemSuspendStatus.ManualResume
member.summary: The user has manually resumed the device from suspend state.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.SystemSuspendStatus.Uninitialized
member.summary: The suspend status is not initialized.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.UserPresenceStatus
member.summary: Defines values that represent the user status associated with the app's session.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.UserPresenceStatus.Absent
member.summary: The user is absent.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Windows.System.Power.UserPresenceStatus.Present
member.summary: The user is present.
